senses.sense_definition: A carnivalesque dance with swords and bucklers, traditionally performed in Spain by costumed troupes.

examples.text: The historical society organized a reenactment of the <w>matachin</w> for the town festival.
During the celebration, the performers executed a lively <w>matachin</w> with wooden swords.

senses.sense_definition: A dancer who performs the matachin dance.

examples.text: Each <w>matachin</w> wore a colorful mask and carried a shield.
The lead <w>matachin</w> signaled the start of the performance with a rhythmic stomp.
